aka: The Romance of a Mediocre Actress and a Short Bald Man
this_title: 그저 그런 여배우와 단신 대머리남의 연애
trans_title: The Romance of a Mediocre Actress and a Short Bald Man
introduction: Jungmi gets the main role for an indie film by chance, after playing many extras and rerun actors. Scrubby Byeongman loves his colleague, Songee. An amiable story about people with difficulties in life.
chinese_title: 그저 그런 여배우와 단신 대머리남의 연애
